title: net/http: PostForm docs should mention PATCH method
body:
The `net/http` parses the request body for the PATCH HTTP method [for quite some time now](https://codereview.appspot.com/70990044).
I think the docs should mention that `PostForm` is available not only for POST and PUT but also for PATCH, that users don't need to dig into the code to discover that.
gov1.4.1
